reviewText: Wow,this movie is great in all ways,video game girls,fanservice and 3D animation sex. This movie starts with Kasumi from "Dead or Alive" in some house with two guys,and its all sex from there,this movie has great animation in all angles. The second movie its about Tifa from Final Fantasy VII in some cell where some people from SOLDIER have her captive in chains,in which she wants to go to the restroom so the guard goes inside to unchain her in which he ends up in the floor with a beating from her,so she gets the key and goes outside the cell where there are a lot of guards waiting for her,she goes inside,closes the door and the guard from inside gets up and kicks in the stomach,and from there is all sex. This movie is a must have for fans who likes both Video Games,I TOTALLY Recommend this movie,you won't regret buying it,but that is Only if you like this kind of Movies.
